availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert J. Russell (Union County, Tennessee, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Sarah Russell. Father of Hiram Russell, Henry Russell, Robert F. Russell, Joseph Russell, Thomas J. Russell, Anna M. Russell, and Millard F. Russell. Farmer in Claiborne County, Tennessee in 1850. Farmer in Union County, Tennessee in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Claiborne County, p. 621.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 11, p. 491.
Find A Grave, "R. J. Russell (1809- 1884)," Memorial #41262205, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41262205 (accessed January 30, 2020).
